About Me

I am a freelancer in the NYC Metropolitan area with a variety of skills in web design, development, photography, and videography. I also work part-time at MLB Advanced Media as a Supervisor in the Logging/Cutting department.

View my resume

Work

CJ Sawmill & Lumber

(Designer, Developer, and Photographer) - A small wood milling business was looking to attract clients via the web. I assessed the services offered, and designed a four page web site from scratch that displays their process and pricing model, along with a gallery plugin and CMS.

Open Link
Photography

(Photographer) - Headshots taken in the West Village (Manhattan) for an aspiring voice actor.

NHL Logger Tools

(Designer and Developer) - At MLBAM the NHL Gamenight Loggers have an overwhelming amount of things to keep track of over a three hour broadcast. I built the Logger Tools to alleviate the mental stress put on a logger while using up a minimal amount of screen real estate.

Open Link
Spare Key

(Directory of Photography - RED Scarlet X) - A short film in which an overworked wife blows off steam to a friend who holds a dark secret.

Watch on YouTube
The Art of Illusion

(Producer, Cameraman, and Assistant Editor - Avid, Panasonic HPX 370, Tascam DR-40) - A documentary diving into the lives of two full time magicians thriving in today's tech age.

Watch on YouTube
